basics.name: Stellan Muller-Cohn
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Highly motivated self-starter with 5+ years of experience in test automation and internal Full Stack web services. Interested in customer-focused Full Stack, Backend and DevOps roles.

work.name: Illumina
work.summary: Software engineer focused on building Backend test infrastructure for continuous integration of  on-instrument software. Promoted to Senior Software Engineer in 2024.
highlights: Implemented and maintained automation for formal verification and continuous testing of on-instrument software using Python and C#
Designed and implemented replacement for manual test agent configuration management process with automated Ansible-based solution
Developed authentication and data management features for an internal web-based data visualization service using the Dash(Python) Full Stack framework
Managed deployments of an internal web-based data visualization service and the required reverse-proxy and cache services

work.name: Mobile Xpress Clinics
work.summary: Contract software engineer responsible for delivering customer and employee facing web and mobile features in support of Covid testing operations.
highlights: Designed and implemented reporting of Covid testing site demographic data using Google Firebase and ReactJS with Typescript
Added functionality for employee Covid testing intake iOS application using Swift
Setup integration tests utilizing production-like Frontend and Backend deployments

work.name: HP
work.summary: Software engineer focused on building and maintaining Python-based automation systems and  internal tooling to support quality and release confidence for a large-scale consumer mobile application.
highlights: Maintained and implemented test automation and framework features for testing of a large-scale consumer mobile-application on both Android and iOS
Built an internal data processing tool to collect and format nightly test results for the QA team

work.name: Dexcom
work.summary: Automation engineer supporting internal IT and identity systems by building and maintaining tooling for employee lifecycle management, authentication, and platform migrations.
highlights: Designed and maintained system for managing employee lifecycle using ServiceNow
Automated migration of employee accounts from legacy to new systems
Stood up and maintained Okta instance
Assisted team with one-off PowerShell scripts

projects.name: RPiPWMFanControl
projects.description: A temperature based fan control daemon for raspberry pi using hardware PWM for efficiency.
highlights: Implemented hardware based PWM fan speed control with temperature-based control system
Designed and implemented git-tag-based build and deployment system for go binaries using GitHub Actions
Created cli interface for configuration of service using go flags

projects.name: ServerPartDealsTable
projects.description: A web app that displays storage media from serverpartdeals.com in an easily sortable and filterable view.
highlights: Reverse engineered and implemented a client for serverpartdeals.com's product data api
Created searchable table view of serverpartdeals.com's product data using Svelte
Setup automated deployment of application to Github pages using Github Actions
